text: Jeongjong of Joseon (26 July 1357 â€“ 24 October 1419) was the second king of the Joseon dynasty. His given name was Yi Bang-gwa (). He became king after his father, Yi Seong-gye, (posthumously known as King Taejo) abdicated (resigned) from the throne. He himself abdicated in 1400. Category:1357 births Category:1419 deaths Category:Kings of Joseon
title: Jeongjong of Joseon
